Posts.Content: Mar 7, 2011 02:13PM Awimom wrote: I would highly recommend finding a physical therapist who specializes in post-mastectomy care.  I had horrible nerve pain about a month after my mastectomy and my friend who is such a PT saw me immediately and used massage, stretching, and kinesio tape to help and it made a world of difference.  She said that she often sees women who have experienced that kind of pain and were treated with pain meds but after a longer time has gone by it is harder to treat.  Good luck...nerve pain can be so horrilble
Posts.Title: Nerve Pain post BMX with Axillary Dissection Question HollyinMich dannade
